com.viaoa.jfc.editor.image
Class OAImagePanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  com.viaoa.jfc.editor.image.OAImagePanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class OAImagePanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel

Manages a BufferedImage that is based on an original image and a collection of undoable changes that have been made to it.

Author:
vincevia
